response.overview: Shovels & Rope: The Movie is a rock n roll fantasy laced into a live concert film capturing the band in peak form during the “Little Seeds” tour and filmed at The Orange Peel in Asheville, NC. Written and Directed by Curtis Wayne Millard, the concert film as a format is turned on it’s head as an ensemble cast of characters find themselves in a mysterious and vibed out series of events culminating in a meeting of two different worlds
response.title: Shovels and Rope: The Movie
